{"id":671909924,"lang":"python3","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1648860394,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"117 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/671909924/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"13.9 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: Optional[ListNode], l2: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]:\n        dummy = ListNode\n        \n        cur = dummy\n        \n        carry = 0\n        \n        while l1 or l2 or carry:\n            v1=l1.val if l1 else 0\n            v2=l2.val if l2 else 0\n            \n            #for new digit\n            val = v1 + v2 + carry\n            carry = val // 10\n            val = val % 10\n            \n            cur.next = ListNode(val)\n            \n            #update pointer for each ll\n            cur = cur.next \n            l1 = l1.next if l1 else None\n            l2 = l2.next if l2 else None\n            \n        return dummy.next\n            \n            ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
